Title: Corona of glans penis
Content: The corona of glans penis or directly from the Latin the corona glandis penis or penis crown refers to the rounded projecting border or flare that forms at the base of the glans in human males. The corona overhangs a mucosal surface known as the neck of the penis which separates the shaft and the glan. The circumference of the Corona is richly innervated and is described as a highly erogenous area of theglans.
